title: Transforming Service Delivery at RNIB with AI Chat Technology | Torchbox

metadata.description: We’ve been exploring AI capabilities with Torchbox to improve service delivery, starting with a chat interface enabled by AI to help professional helpline staff find information quickly while on the phone with a user.
